translations.text: O you covered up ˹in your clothes˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Do not do a favour expecting more ˹in return˺.<sup foot_note=77564>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And persevere for ˹the sake of˺ your Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹For˺ when the Trumpet will be sounded,<sup foot_note=77565>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: that will ˹truly˺ be a difficult Day—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: far from easy for the disbelievers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And leave to me ˹O Prophet˺ the one I created all by Myself,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and children always by his side,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and made life very easy for him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Yet he is hungry for more.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! ˹For˺ he has been truly stubborn with Our revelations.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: I will make his fate unbearable,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: for he contemplated and determined ˹a degrading label for the Quran˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: May he be condemned! How evil was what he determined!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: May he be condemned even more! How evil was what he determined!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: then turned his back ˹on the truth˺ and acted arrogantly,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ

translations.text: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but magic from the ancients.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: This is no more than the word of a man.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Soon I will burn him in Hell!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what Hell is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It does not let anyone live or die,<sup foot_note=77566>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ

translations.text: We have appointed only ˹stern˺ angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers,<sup foot_note=77567>1</sup> so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those ˹hypocrites˺ with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this ˹description of Hell˺ is only a reminder to humanity.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama jaAAalna as-habaannari illa mala-ikatan wamajaAAalna AAiddatahum illa fitnatan lillatheenakafaroo liyastayqina allatheena ootoo alkitabawayazdada allatheena amanoo eemananwala yartaba allatheena ootoo alkitabawalmu/minoona waliyaqoola allatheena feequloobihim maradun walkafiroona mathaarada Allahu bihatha mathalan kathalikayudillu Allahu man yashao wayahdee man yashaowama yaAAlamu junooda rabbika illa huwa wamahiya illa thikra lilbashar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the night as it retreats,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the day as it breaks!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ

translations.text: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Liman shaa minkum an yataqaddama awyataakhkhar
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Every soul will be detained for what it has done,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: except the people of the right,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: who will be in Gardens, asking one another
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: about the wicked ˹who will then be asked˺:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: nor did we feed the poor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: We used to indulge ˹in falsehood˺ along with others,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and deny the Day of Judgment,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: until the inevitable came to us.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: as if they were spooked zebras
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً

translations.text: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a ˹personal˺ letter ˹from Allah˺ for all ˹to read˺.<sup foot_note=77568>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal yureedu kullu imri-in minhum an yu/tasuhufan munashshara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Enough! Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ

translations.text: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He ˹alone˺ is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama yathkuroona illaan yashaa Allahu huwa ahlu attaqwawaahlu almaghfirat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
